channel.title: Connecting to servers sucks harcdore...anyone have a working one?
channel.description: ok ive tried no joke like 40 diffrent servers and only got 2 to connect and it was only for like 5 mins...is there something im doing wrong? and if im not does anyone have a server that works and doesnt crash withing 2 secs? i would really love that! so please reply thanks. ___like___a__[]-[]30+on=crack wierd sig ^
